FLIGHT_NO_IATA like #{params.flightNoIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update DAILY_FLIGHT_MASTER
ARN = #{arn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLIGHT_NO_ICAO = #{flightNoIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AIRLINE_CODE_IATA = #{airlineCodeIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AIRLINE_CODE_ICAO = #{airlineCodeIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_AIRPORT_IATA = #{originAirportIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ICAO = #{originAirportIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEST_AIRPORT_IATA = #{destAirportIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEST_AIRPORT_ICAO = #{destAirportIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_FLIGHT_NO_IATA = #{prevFlightNoIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREV_FLIGHT_NO_ICAO = #{prevFlightNoIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NXT_FLIGHT_NO_IATA = #{nxtFlightNoIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NXT_FLIGHT_NO_ICAO = #{nxtFlightNoIcao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAND = #{stand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GATE_1 = #{gate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GATE_2 = #{gate2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GATE_3 = #{gate3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RWY = #{rwy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELT_1 = #{belt1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELT_2 = #{belt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELT_3 = #{belt3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTERS = #{counters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAXIWAY = #{taxiway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEICING_GATE = #{deicingGate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
D_OR_I = #{dOrI,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MILESTONE_STATUS = #{milestoneStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELAY_STATUS = #{delayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_DELAY_CODE = #{currentDelayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATMO = #{atmo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FADT = #{fadt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATOT = #{atot,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SLDT = #{sldt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ELDT = #{eldt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ALDT = #{aldt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIBT = #{sibt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EIBT = #{eibt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AIBT = #{aibt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXIT = #{exit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AXIT = #{axit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCGT = #{scgt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ECGT = #{ecgt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACGT = #{acgt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AEGT = #{aegt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MTTT = #{mttt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ETTT = #{ettt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STTT = #{sttt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGHT = #{aght,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SSBT = #{ssbt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ESBT = #{esbt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASBT = #{asbt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SRDT = #{srdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ERDT = #{erdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ARDT = #{ardt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ESRT = #{esrt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASRT = #{asrt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SSAT = #{ssat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ESAT = #{esat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TSAT = #{tsat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASAT = #{asat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SOBT = #{sobt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EOBT = #{eobt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TOBT = #{tobt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AOBT = #{aobt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXOT = #{exot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AXOT = #{axot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ERZT = #{erzt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SCZT = #{sczt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ECZT = #{eczt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACZT = #{aczt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEZT = #{sezt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EEZT = #{eezt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AEZT = #{aezt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADIT = #{adit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STOT = #{stot,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ETOT = #{etot,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TTOT = #{ttot,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EET = #{eet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIVERSIONSTATUS = #{diversionstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FLIGHT_NO_IATA = #{flightNoIata,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OPERATIONAL_DATE = #{operationalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and A_OR_D = #{aOrD,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT = #{flightRepeatCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
